bm_desc: IITL : 06-Dec-2024 :  The Company has informed the Exchange that a Board meeting to be held on December 03, 2024 has been re-scheduled. Further, the Company has informed the Exchange that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on December 06, 2024,  To consider other business matters
To consider Fund Raising and other business matters
to consider and approve proposal for issuance of Equity Shares and / or Convertible Securities on a Preferential Basis for an amount not exceeding Rs. 2000 crore
To consider voluntary delisting of Equity Shares of the Company from Calcutta Stock Exchange Ltd
To consider issuance of equity shares of the Company on a preferential basis
Intimation of Board Meeting of Sustainable Energy Infra Investment Managers Private Limited(acting as an Investment Manager to Sustainable Energy Infra Trust)
To consider and approve the Proposal for issue of Bonus Shares to the equity shareholders of the Company
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2024
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2024 and dividend
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2024
